pages.text: $(9)Piercing$() refers to how much of your target's armor is ignored when you attack them.$(p)This stat is only found on heavy weapons.

$(9)$(n)Base Value:$() 1$(p)$(9)$(n)Max Value:$() 1024$(p)Note: A value of 1.0 is actually 0% piercing, but if the base was zero, percentage modifiers would have no effect, and flat modifiers don't convey the bonus correctly.
